Class Wombat

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Wombat

public class Wombat
extends greenfoot.Actor

Wombat. A Wombat moves forward until it can't do so anymore, at which point it turns left. If a wombat finds a leaf, it eats it.

Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Michael Kolling
